alldb.table_sql:
select tw.id id, tw.area area, tw.proj_moneye projmoney, tw.proj_name projname, tw.proj_number projnumber, tw.proj_status projstatus, tw.proj_date projdate, tw.saleweek_id saleweekid from t_sale_week_report ts left join t_sale_week_report_detail tw on ts.id = tw.saleweek_id where 1=1
/~projstatus: AND tw.proj_status = '{projstatus}' ~/ /~startdate: AND ts.start_date = '{startdate}' ~/ /~id: AND ts.id='{id}' ~/ /~weekstyle: AND ts.week_style = '{weekstyle}' ~/ /~id: AND ts.register_id='{registerid}' ~/
